title: Uber driver sought in Toronto sex assault
content:
TORONTO - Toronto police are seeking an Uber driver they allege sexually assaulted a passenger earlier this week. 
 

                            Police say an Uber driver picked up a 25-year-old woman Tuesday and drove her to her home in north Toronto. 
 

                            They allege he then sexually assaulted her inside the car. 
 

                            Police are trying to identify the driver, who they describe as 26 to 30 years old, with short black spiked hair and a short chin-strap type beard. 
 

                            They say his Uber profile is listed under the name "Amritpal." 
 

                            By The Canadian Press
